messages.subject: shimabara revolt
messages.msgSnippet: I saw the lists of samurai battles on this website. I was wondering why the siege of hara castle in 1637 wasn t included? Aside from christians (both samurai
messages.messageBody:
I saw the lists of samurai battles on this website. I was wondering
why the siege of hara castle in 1637 wasn't included? Aside from
christians (both samurai and peasant) there were also disgruntled
samurai who participated on the side of the rebels.
